section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 [ยง 2-501 et seq.], shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this part.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Section 401(b) of D.C. Law 20-96 provided that rules promulgated pursuant to the Veterinary Practice Act of 1982 shall remain in effect until the Mayor promulgates rules to implement D.C. Law 20-96.
